messages.subject: Could you help me find this game ?
messages.msgSnippet: I had downloaded a little math game which I really liked playing with my daughter. It was a little like this one (look and principle) :
messages.messageBody:
I had downloaded a little math game which I really liked playing with my daughter. It was a little like this one (look and principle) :

http://www.gomaths.ch/jeux/numbers.htm

though easier (which is why I would like to find it again).

You also had to remove blocks of numbers which add up to equal a number appearing on the right-hand side of the screen - but you could see the numbers in advance (they were stacking up) and you had a few "magic weapons" to help you if you were stuck (a bomb, and things like that).

I can't remember the name of this game (my computer crashed down and I don't have the game anymore) and I'm searching Internet like crazy to find it.

If it rings a bell to anybody, it would be greatly appreciated by my daughter and me.

Many thanks in advance
Helene
